title: Sri Lanka : Nation-wide curfew extended to Wednesday (11) 7 AM
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has extended the nation-wide curfew to 7 AM on Wednesday (11) with immediate effect,  by virtue of the powers vested under section 16 of the Public Security Ordinance (Chapter 40).
